docs.snippet: The White House said it was too early to be sure what targets Russia was hitting inside Syria to support President Bashar al-Assad....
docs.lead_paragraph: The White House said it was too early to be sure what targets Russia was hitting inside Syria to support President Bashar al-Assad.

headline.main: Ash Carter: Russian air strikes in Syria probably not in Islamic State areas
headline.sub: Ash Carter: Russian air strikes in Syria probably not in Islamic State areas

docs.snippet: The U.S. Defense Secretary says he has directed a team to meet with Russian defense counterparts as soon as possible - in the next few days. Rough Cut. (no reporter narration)...
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Defense Secretary says he has directed a team to meet with Russian defense counterparts as soon as possible - in the next few days. Rough Cut. (no reporter narration)

headline.main: Sandusky Wants Subpoena Power to Look Into 2011 Case Leaks
headline.print_headline: Sandusky Wants Subpoena Power to Look Into 2011 Case Leaks

docs.snippet: Former Penn State assistant football coach Jerry Sandusky wants a judge to let him explore contacts between prosecutors and a judge who oversaw the grand jury that recommended he be charged with child molestation....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Penn State assistant football coach Jerry Sandusky wants a judge to let him explore contacts between prosecutors and a judge who oversaw the grand jury that recommended he be charged with child molestation.

headline.main: Impersonator Who Voiced Lincoln Memorial Recordings Dies
headline.print_headline: Impersonator Who Voiced Lincoln Memorial Recordings Dies

docs.snippet: An Abraham Lincoln impersonator whose voice stood for the 16th president's at the Lincoln Memorial and Gettysburg ceremonies has died....
docs.lead_paragraph: An Abraham Lincoln impersonator whose voice stood for the 16th president's at the Lincoln Memorial and Gettysburg ceremonies has died.

headline.main: Countries Supporting Platini Wary as Swiss Probe $2 Million Payment
headline.print_headline: Countries Supporting Platini Wary as Swiss Probe $2 Million Payment

docs.snippet: Key nations backing European soccer boss Michel Platini as the next FIFA President are adopting a more cautious approach to his bid while Swiss authorities investigating graft at world soccer's governing body look into a $2 million payment it made...
docs.lead_paragraph: Key nations backing European soccer boss Michel Platini as the next FIFA President are adopting a more cautious approach to his bid while Swiss authorities investigating graft at world soccer's governing body look into a $2 million payment it made to him.

headline.main: Deutsche Penalized for Swaps Reporting Violations
headline.print_headline: Deutsche Penalized for Swaps Reporting Violations

docs.snippet: In the first action of its kind, Deutsche Bank was ordered to pay a $2.5 million penalty for failing to properly report its swaps transactions, the U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: In the first action of its kind, Deutsche Bank was ordered to pay a $2.5 million penalty for failing to properly report its swaps transactions, the U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Russian Air Strikes Unleash New Devastation in Syrian Region, Say Residents
headline.print_headline: Russian Air Strikes Unleash New Devastation in Syrian Region, Say Residents

docs.snippet: Syrians living in rebel-held areas of Homs province have seen a lot of destruction in four years of war, but say the Russian air force unleashed a whole new level of devastation in air strikes on their towns on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Syrians living in rebel-held areas of Homs province have seen a lot of destruction in four years of war, but say the Russian air force unleashed a whole new level of devastation in air strikes on their towns on Wednesday.

headline.main: US Finds Kuwait Airline Discriminates Against Israelis
headline.print_headline: US Finds Kuwait Airline Discriminates Against Israelis

docs.snippet: In a challenge to boycotts of Israel, the U.S. government has found that Kuwait Airways unlawfully discriminated against a passenger traveling on an Israeli passport by refusing to sell him a ticket for a New York to London flight....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a challenge to boycotts of Israel, the U.S. government has found that Kuwait Airways unlawfully discriminated against a passenger traveling on an Israeli passport by refusing to sell him a ticket for a New York to London flight.

headline.main: EPA: Tractor Supply Co. ATVs Didn't Meet Clean Air Rules
headline.print_headline: EPA: Tractor Supply Co. ATVs Didn't Meet Clean Air Rules

docs.snippet: Tractor Supply Company Inc. has reached a settlement with federal regulators over the illegal sale of 28,000 off-road vehicles and small engines that failed to meet Clean Air Act requirements....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tractor Supply Company Inc. has reached a settlement with federal regulators over the illegal sale of 28,000 off-road vehicles and small engines that failed to meet Clean Air Act requirements.

headline.main: Three’s a Trend: Slouchy White T-Shirts
